website_summaries.verdict: Designed for high-efficiency washing machines and using innovative packaging that saves plastic, the Tide Smart Pouch saves time and money while offering a deep clean that is gentle on skin.
pros: Tide Smart Pouches can be used separately or to refill existing Tide containers, eliminating plastic waste
Works well even on tough stains like grass
Formula will not irritate sensitive skin
Specially designed for modern high-efficiency washers
cons: The lack of fragrance appeals to some, but does not leave clothes smelling freshly laundered

customer_reviews.title: The bag leaked and stained my carpet
customer_reviews.text: These bags are unreliable and may come leaking all over everything. The detergent leaked out of the bag and onto my carpet where it caused a permanent bleach stain. The stain is very noticeable and will cost me dearly with my rental deposit. I can't think of any other product causing me this amount of financial trouble. I will avoid buying in the future, what's the point of detergent bags that can't keep the detergent safely contained?
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Farver

customer_reviews.title: Tide, for skin allergies
customer_reviews.text: My clothes have never been clear. I use the free and gentle because i have skin allergies. This product works great. It is HE for washers, suds less. Cleans clothes great, takes stains out, without leaving residue that will initiate my skin. All around winner, you cannot go wrong, this is not as budget friendly unless you subscribe, but it is less harmful to the environment in this packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to order through Subscribe and Save. I switched to Tide after a friend told me it doesn’t bother her kid’s with allergies. I’ve found the same, plus I don’t need to use any additional treatments or buy any other products because it cleans really well. It has no odor which is necessary because I get migraines from smells and it doesn’t bother my family with allergy and eczema problems. Will continue to buy through Amazon as it is easy and cost effective at this time.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: The Best for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Tide's new Free and Gentle formula is awesome. I won't use regular detergent anymore. My skin and nose can tell the difference. Also, the price of buying a multi-pack on Amazon is unbeatable. I've had problems in the past with liquid soaps from Amazon arriving damaged/leaking, but this particular shipment arrived in-tact in its original box and I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Less waste
customer_reviews.text: My family has sensitive skin and this detergent works best for us. This is the best sensitive skin detergent I have found for getting the clothes clean/ stains out the first time every time without fading my laundry. I really like these pouches. I feel much better about recycling the pouch than the empty bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less plastic waste and great price. A true win-win
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy tide is making these pouch refills. I just refill my plastic bottle with this detergent and recycle the pouch. So much less plastic waste and the unscented free and clear formula is great for our little one who has eczema. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mommyinthecity

customer_reviews.title: I need Free & Gentle for my dry skin, and I love being able to get affordable refills from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I have serious dry-skin issues on my hands and body, and Free & Gentle has been perfect for me for years. I also require the HE type. A year or two ago, I discovered that I could get refills via Amazon that are more eco-friendly than the plastic bottles. They also have to be amazingly less expensive than the Tide bottles that I can buy here in the middle of nowhere. So I love being able to get the refills from Amazon: more eco-friendly, and definitely more budget-friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with this product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived leaking all over inside of box. I tried to initiate a return an told this product was ineligible. I don’t know why.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: may leak in shipment- as others have noted
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this detergent for years and was happy to see it packaged in a smart pouch to reduce waste, at leas a little bit. I've bought other products from Amazon in the same sort of packaging and products arrived without damage. At least one of the three pouches of Tide leaked during shipment- not much but enough to show up inside the shipping box and to make the outside of two pouches slippery, thus the 4 stars. Not a big deal, but I can see the potential for a real mess. Maybe the rush to fill, ship and deliver orders during the pandemic means less careful handling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank god for unscented Tide!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! The old Tide used to smell so good, but what’s now touted as “original scent” is more floral - and that makes it problematic for those of us with bad scent sensitivities. (Febreez or another “air freshener” that's been recently sprayed into a room will give me nausea and a headache within minutes.) The pouches are convenient to pour into my dispenser jug if I can't find the Tide Free and Gentle in a bottle - I just wish the pouches were recyclable around here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Cat Pee
customer_reviews.text: Been a long time buyer of Tide Free and Gentle. One whiff of this is enough to make you sick. The smell is reminiscent of cat pee. Obviously not a scent one would like to associate with freshly laundered clothes.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Cant buy this in stores
customer_reviews.text: Of course Tide is a household name ... the product is decades tested and proven to be the best. If you are pro-environment, these are the best containers. They are so easy to use and take up almost no space when empty. In addition, you can get every last drop. As the title says ... you can't buy these in the stores ... not sure why, but I don't care, I get them here with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: S E  Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can refill the large 90 oz. plastic bottle w/ these. Locally they are not sold anywhere-- the clerks looked at me as if I were nuts when asking for these. The price is fabulous when you do the math.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: BeWaRE oF LeaKINg
customer_reviews.text: All three packages were sticky and covered with detergent. At some point in time there was a leak, I am not sure if it was one of my products or another product from something else. None the less, I didn't appreciate having to rinse off the refill packages. It is an inconvenience to me and for it to be leaking is wasteful. I do not think I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: DEN99

customer_reviews.title: Great Refills
customer_reviews.text: These are a good, more environment friendly, refill for your Tide. I like this particular soap as there is no scent. Tide cleans well and I have no problems using it. This is my standard laundry detergent and I like this type of refill. I'm ordering more now and would recommend them for anyone that uses this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great subscribe and save product
customer_reviews.text: We love using this detergent at home for all of the family’s laundry. We had tide recommended to us for cloth diapering and it has done a great job. We like the refill packs as it is cheaper and you can get it on subscribe and save. A lot cheaper than baby-specific detergent and is great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Easy pour spout
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a better deal by buying these but really 3 of them is the same price if not more expensive that the big ‘96 loads’ container we usually get. I almost wish if I’m not saving money we could at least condense the refillable packaging more for less waste.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE FLEEK

customer_reviews.title: Is this BOGUS?
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't create any lather - no soap in the washer at all, no matter what part of the cycle. I am not sure why, so I think that this may well be a FAKE product. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Birdygirl

customer_reviews.title: Environmental Friendly - Works & Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: Love ways I can reduce the footprint in our environment. Reusable containers and using ways to refill is a plus. This product is wonderful for those of us that have sensitivity to chemicals. Will not use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: StormyBlues

customer_reviews.title: Smells wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this pack 8 times previously and was happy with it. The last 2 times, there is something wrong with the smell. It’s bad. It’s nothing like the bottle form the grocery store. I thought the first time was a fluke but now twice in a row, and only from Amazon. Won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeeee

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I got a bundle deal on these because my baby have eczema and this has worked so far. I don’t think it really cleans that well and there is absolutely so scent. I think it is too pricey for what it is if it is at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Shananigans

customer_reviews.title: love Tide
customer_reviews.text: I love using Tide detergent on my clothes. I can always depend on it to clean my clothes well. I don't use it all the time because of the cost, but it is my favorite. I had never used this kind before, but it performed well.
customer_reviews.author: meleona

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Great if u go to laundromat because it’s light and dos not take up a lot of space, As quality Tide talks for itself. Always good. U can use it to refill as well the plastic can detergent
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema, so this detergent is good for me. I don’t like scents on my clothes. I like the packaging too. I just poured this bag into my old empty container I hadn’t thrown away yet.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most is this great product is in this very easy to dispose of container. No bulky or big plastic jug to deal with, when emptied, the pouch just folds flat as paper. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Not good with hard water
customer_reviews.text: It sucks. I love tide and this particular model of thier product I did a call to let them know. I will always buy tide original. I will never buy this stuff again. I have hard water and it just cant compete.
customer_reviews.author: Rick and Earlene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gentle Unscented Detergent.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give this enough stars. It’s truly gentle and unscented. I did make the mistake of thinking that they were just small bags, not refills. But by absolute happy accident, they’re the same as the current jug of detergent I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: cleans cloth good
customer_reviews.text: no complain about this detergent, and it doe sjob very well. wash dirt off and keep cloth clean. also Unscented is a very big plus for me due to my kids is allergic boy..
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wang

customer_reviews.title: Love reducing plastic waste!
customer_reviews.text: My family has sensitive skin and we've had the best of luck with Tide Free and Gentle! LOVE that I can order the pouches and reduce the amount of plastic I'm bringing home! I wish ALL companies would switch to this model.
customer_reviews.author: Leah F

customer_reviews.title: Only fills about a bottle and a half
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the wording is misleading, this is not a 3 bottle refill, not the common size sold in other stores. It is about one and a half bottles total.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent detergent and now in less packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this detergent for sensitive skin. The new packaging is GREAT. Kept our original Tide bottle and refill it with these enormous pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Richards

customer_reviews.title: Look at Picture Carefully
customer_reviews.text: This is 3 bags of 31 loads each for a total of 93 loads. Same price as one 96 load bottle, but more mess and trouble for me. I like the idea of less plastic, but then it should cost less. I won't be doing this again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this option for getting detergent. Less bulk and less plastic. The detergent itself is great. Works well and doesn’t have that cloying smell so many have.
customer_reviews.author: 5shep

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of less packaging and refilling the dispenser ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of less packaging and refilling the dispenser that I already have, but I'm not completely sure that it is all that more sustainable and not just marketing. The product itself is good and does the job. Also, when this arrived at my home there was a small hole in one of the pouches so they were all coated with detergent. Because I was just pouring them into another container anyway it wasn't a big deal, but it was still disappointing and a messier experience than I was planning for.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L

customer_reviews.title: Not all that great, didn't clean
customer_reviews.text: I never really felt like this cleaned my clothes. Granted, I have cats and a dog, And while very little does help get rid of their hair on all my clothes, I have just had better luck with other detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the same os other Tide Products
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance Free . Clear. Works great. If you have allergies, asthma, eczema or other issues this is the detergent you should be using.
customer_reviews.author: GZG

customer_reviews.title: Refills
customer_reviews.text: I think I expected a more concentrated version that would need maybe two tablespoons to wash a load ... these are just regular refills. Still smaller to haul to the laundry room, but I’m not sure I’ve really saved on plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Spasibasong

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the softsided bags of detergent and the easy pour spout. Nice to have less trash when empty. Good laundry product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelyle

customer_reviews.title: Too bad no longer can get
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does good in all waters. These packages were much easier to handle then a big jug. Too bad we can't get them any more.
customer_reviews.author: thomas pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Have to transfer to bottle
customer_reviews.text: If transferred to an empty bottle, fine. To use as is can be messy holding a floppy bag while aiming the tip.
customer_reviews.author: SueT.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for Unscented Tide Free & Clear Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Tide Free and Clear is a good solid laundry detergent that we have used for years. This was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: AuntSheShe

customer_reviews.title: Washes well, no scent, great price
customer_reviews.text: Use this for our general laundry as well as washing cloth diapers and it works really well 😀
customer_reviews.author: MamaNueva26

customer_reviews.title: refills
customer_reviews.text: I have the containers and just refill them. These are cheaper than buying the containers and then what? having to recycle or land fill?
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Need to make them recyclable!
customer_reviews.text: Love packaging to just pour into exsisting container. Helps eliminate waste but have found out they are not recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: readingmom

customer_reviews.title: Can't get out
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my mom if Florida who is elderly and can't get out due to the corona virus scare... Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Janene

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Less expensive than grocery store. Use to refill the regular laundry container. This is easy to store also. My dermatologist recommended this product. Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Refill Pouches
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s in a flexible bag so I can refill my last detergent tub. I became allergic to scented detergents (fragrances and additives) and this doesn’t cause me to have allergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Less waste
customer_reviews.text: Great refill pouches, just keep filling your normal retail bottle with these and roll up the empty pouch and discard. Much less waste, and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sensitive skin and conveniently packaged.
customer_reviews.text: I love the small pour spouts on these pouches, it helps with keeping the spills to a minimum. I'm also all for 3-packs.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the individual smaller containers. Easy to store and pour.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S. Neal's Music

customer_reviews.title: Good clean scent
customer_reviews.text: Good. No scent, good for sensative individuals. Cleans very well we use less than recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and the no scent and the way it cleans the clothes and the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: mcjoy

customer_reviews.title: Tide...allergy free!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product. My skin doesn't react to the chemicals in it. Easy to carry and dispose.
customer_reviews.author: IWeber

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Live how this product can be used without the bulky heavy container. Great for sensitive skin issues and cleans your clothes without fading.
customer_reviews.author: MoreMeeces

customer_reviews.title: Bags are the coolest thing since detergent
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome. I hate having to go to the store to buy more detergent. I love that these bags come in the mail and I can fill up my one jug as it runs low.
customer_reviews.author: LAReid

customer_reviews.title: Rancid detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is our normal detergent that we use for clothes and cloth diapers. And normally we love it and have never had an issue. However, 2 refill bottles in the box with the same lot number were completely rancid. I didn’t know that could happen. Going to seek a partial refund. Beware the lot number 9216517012 bottled at 9:40!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stanley

customer_reviews.title: which was great. Hard to find nowadays
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering pods, so it was my mistake when they arrived. You'll need something to transfer the liquid to, since the cap isn't really made to twist on and off securely. However, it was unscented, which was great. Hard to find nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this detergent quite a lot. I use it to refill the original bottle I bought, fills it easily. It has no real scent. I have sensitive skin, and this does not irritate it. The one thing it can't do is get the weird workout clothes funk out, I need to use special sport wash for that. Otherwise, great for cleaning clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie

customer_reviews.title: One of the 3 packs leaked
customer_reviews.text: One of the 3 packs leaked all over. The bag was not punctured, it just leaked thru the cap. I see this is a somewhat common problem. A real mess
customer_reviews.author: gibster

customer_reviews.title: Pourable tide
customer_reviews.text: I like the detergent but thought it was the pods. I was disappointed that I could not exchange the product for the pods
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best way to save $ and space.
customer_reviews.text: With the shortages and wanting to save space I just reuse my existing container and refill.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent refill option
customer_reviews.text: Love that these save the plastic and are less cumbersome to store.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, doesn't cause any skin rashes and leaves my clothes feeling so soft. No need to use fabric softener.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient packaging
customer_reviews.text: Ordered during the start of the pandemic, turned out to be a great buy. Love the packaging, will order again.

customer_reviews.title: The product is the same.
customer_reviews.text: Its a refill bag ( thin plastic) meant to be poured into a normal red tide bottle. Savings in USD isn't that much but its delivered to the door.

customer_reviews.title: Space saving packaging
customer_reviews.text: Really like this option for refill packages. Much less waste.

customer_reviews.title: It’s About time!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome packaging! Thank you. Doesn’t spill like previous lid, and less bulk.

customer_reviews.title: Great plastic waste reduction alternative
customer_reviews.text: A great plastic reduction alternative to continually buying the bottles.

customer_reviews.title: I have used for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this detergent for several years. It is the best detergent I have ever used.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it came in easy to dispense pouches. I just poured them into my jug that I already had.

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: Save a lid from previous tied bottle and it works great

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can refill my big jug with these. And it’s safe and light in scent for my family.

customer_reviews.title: works great i use these to refill some larger containers i ...
customer_reviews.text: works great i use these to refill some larger containers i have if you can grab these on sale they are cheaper then buying from the store. i just wish they ran these on promo more often
customer_reviews.author: dragcon

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to purchase liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.text: I like the unscented products, easier on those of us with allergies.

customer_reviews.title: It cleans.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Persons with sensitive skin my want to try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper & less waste
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent and finding these refills at a lower cost is great
customer_reviews.author: Jamie K

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and no eligible to return?
customer_reviews.text: One of the containers was leaking. The box is soaked, and the other containers are soap. And for some reason I can't return them? Not going to buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Finn

customer_reviews.title: Nice and gentle- no scent
customer_reviews.text: Do their job. Nice and gentle- no scent. I just refill my current container. Saves space and $
customer_reviews.author: josh s.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product several times and I am generally satisfied with function of the detergent and the bags. However my latest purchase included a messy manufacturing defect. It appears one of the bags was not cut correctly leading to a slow leak in transit. FYI to whoever manufacturers the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It works great and saves so much room. Only issue was my first shipment had some leakage but I dealt with it. My second shipment was fine. Overall very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the dirt, gentle on the skin.
customer_reviews.text: We love the fact that it cleans well in small amounts. Perfect for those with sensitive skin. No complaints at our home!

customer_reviews.title: less plastic is a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to refill the plastic bottle from pouches. Need more products like this, please. The detergent works great, too.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is a lifesaver or shall I say skin saver, for those of us with SUPER sensitive skin and allergies to fragrance.

customer_reviews.title: Love Tide
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have to lug the jugs home from the grocery.

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not messy, good for people with sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: very happy with reducing our plastic consumption with these recyclable pouches
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived as pictured, very happy with reducing our plastic consumption with these recyclable pouches.

customer_reviews.title: Nice detergent for cloths and cent free
customer_reviews.text: Tide is best detergent for cloths and it works really great. Happy with quality and it is cent free.

customer_reviews.title: Less bulk, good product, still plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Wish they would make more product refills this way. What I'd really like to see is better packaging and less plastic!

customer_reviews.title: Love the pouches
customer_reviews.text: I love buying the pouches because they are much easier to store extra and a cheaper than buying in the store!

customer_reviews.text: Babies broke out in rash head to toe using this product.

customer_reviews.title: Very diluted, watery.

customer_reviews.title: NOT SURE IF IT WAS A GOOD IDEA
customer_reviews.text: HAVE A PROBLEM WITH GETTING WHITES GOOD ENOUGH FOR ME
customer_reviews.author: Donna  Sabey

customer_reviews.title: l particularly like the compact pouch which takes up less room than ...
customer_reviews.text: l particularly like the compact pouch which takes up less room than the hard plastic containers. Very easy to use when refilling container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the tide in pouches
customer_reviews.text: I love the tide in pouches, stores nicely. My favorite detergent, so glad I can order it from Amazon at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Bounds8879

customer_reviews.title: The only way I buy detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way I'll buy my detergent now. I've kept a jug from Tide meant for 64 loads and continue to refill it with the pouches. Every now and then I need to wash the cap, and I'll just throw it in the washer with the load at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Living is a rural area, the closest store is 45 minutes away to buy household items at an affordable cost. Subscribing and saving to products we already use save is time and money. Definitely worth it! The product came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Same old product, all new benefits!
customer_reviews.text: I love that “no scent” doesn’t mean smells medical, or, like a chemical! I saved my old container of the same product in case I needed to fill these into it. But, I was very pleasantly surprised that this packaging isn’t flimsy and can be used all on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is great. It is intended to refil your plastic bottle, however I just pour it into an old detergent cup
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Henry

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of cutting back on the bottles but there bags are just awkward and hard to store.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddictNYC

customer_reviews.title: Leaky package
customer_reviews.text: We love this Tide because there are no dyes or fragrances. My daughter has eczema so we use for all of our laundry. Unfortunately, twice this product has arrived damaged, leaking out onto other items in my delivery!
customer_reviews.author: TarheelMom

product_meta.title: Tide Free and Gentle HE Laundry Detergent, Pack of 3 Smart Pouches, Unscented and Hypoallergenic for Sensitive Skin, 93 Loads
product_meta.description:
Size:48 Fl Oz (Pack of 3)

Tide Free & Gentle is a powerful HE liquid laundry detergent that delivers deeper clean that is gentle on skin (1) and is designed free of dyes and perfumes. It removes more residue from dirt, food and stains than the leading Free detergent and, as part of the Tide Family, you can expect a dependable clean in every load. Tide Free & Gentle High Efficiency liquid laundry detergent that is gentle on your sensitive skin is now available in a revolutionary Tide Smart Pouch that uses 60% less packaging (2)

Tide Smart Pouch packaging makes your laundry detergent more convenient to store and really easy to use; just pour it from the pouch into an empty Tide bottle or use it directly from the pouch using a measuring cup. Enjoy great cleaning performance from innovative packaging.
